name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3D新衣装お披露目!! 兎田ぺこら生誕祭ライブ♪【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [jgoJuJiWtf4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'World is Mine' by Usada Pekora and Gawr Gura.
Transition and stage change with background music.
Performance of 'Chikyuu Saigo no Kokuhaku o' by Usada Pekora and AZKi.

subtitles.original: …とね
subtitles.english: ...and you know,

subtitles.original: 白いお馬さん 決まってるでしょ
subtitles.english: A white horse is a given, right?

subtitles.original: 迎えに来て
subtitles.english: Come pick me up.

subtitles.original: わかったら かしずいて 手を取って 「お姫様」って
subtitles.english: If you understand, bow down, take my hand, and call me "Princess."

subtitles.original: べつに わがままなんて言ってないんだから
subtitles.english: It's not like I'm being selfish or anything.

subtitles.original: でもね 少しぐらい 叱ってくれたっていいのよ
subtitles.english: But you know, it's okay to scold me just a little.

subtitles.original: 世界で私だけのおうじさま
subtitles.english: My one and only prince in the world.

subtitles.original: 気がついて ほらほら おててが空いてます
subtitles.english: Notice me! Look, look, my hand is empty.

subtitles.original: 無口で不愛想な王子さま
subtitles.english: My quiet and unsociable prince.

subtitles.original: もう、どうして！
subtitles.english: Geez, why?!

subtitles.original: 気が付いてよ早く
subtitles.english: Notice me already!

subtitles.original: あっ！
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: ぜったい君は分かってない
subtitles.english: You definitely don't understand.

subtitles.original: 分かってないわ…
subtitles.english: You just don't get it...

subtitles.original: いちごの載ったショートケーキ
subtitles.english: Shortcake topped with strawberries.

subtitles.original: こだわりたまごのとろけるプリン
subtitles.english: Melting pudding made with special eggs.

subtitles.original: みんな みんな 我慢します…
subtitles.english: I'll hold back on all of them...

subtitles.original: わがままな子だと思わないで
subtitles.english: So don't think I'm a selfish girl.

subtitles.original: 私だってやればできるの
subtitles.english: I can do it if I try.

subtitles.original: あとで後悔するわよ
subtitles.english: You'll regret it later!

subtitles.original: 当然です！だって私は
subtitles.english: Of course! Because I am

subtitles.original: 世界で一番おひめさま
subtitles.english: The number one princess in the world.

subtitles.original: ちゃんと見ててよね どこかに行っちゃうよ？
subtitles.english: Keep your eyes on me, or I might go somewhere else.

subtitles.original: ふいに抱きしめられた 急にそんな、えっ？
subtitles.english: Suddenly you hugged me. So out of the blue, huh?

subtitles.original: 「惹かれる、危ないよ」
subtitles.english: "You're so attractive, it's dangerous."

subtitles.original: そう言ってそっぽ向く君
subtitles.english: You said that and looked away.

subtitles.original: こっちのが危ないわよ
subtitles.english: You're the dangerous one here!

subtitles.original: そして君が知らずに 幸せな灰になったとて
subtitles.english: Even if you turn into happy ashes without knowing,

subtitles.original: 僕は今更 君が好きだって
subtitles.english: I'm only now realizing that I love you.

subtitles.original: 地球最後の告白を
subtitles.english: The Earth's Last Confession

subtitles.original: 大人になりたくないよなんて 大人ぶってさ
subtitles.english: Saying things like "I don't want to grow up" while acting like an adult,

subtitles.original: 駆け出した少年の日
subtitles.english: In those days when I was a boy running wild.

subtitles.original: どーやら僕に訪れた悪戯は
subtitles.english: It seems the prank that befell me

subtitles.original: 相当タチの悪い 不老不死の世界
subtitles.english: Was a rather malicious world of immortality.

subtitles.original: 「神様ステキなプレゼントありがと」なんて
subtitles.english: Saying things like "Thank you God for this wonderful gift,"

subtitles.original: 到底的外れな 幼い冗談のふりに
subtitles.english: Pretending to make a completely misplaced, childish joke.

subtitles.original: 大事に隠した 片思いは察してくれないんだ
subtitles.english: You didn't notice the unrequited love I carefully hid.

subtitles.original: 追い越してく 戻れない憧憬
subtitles.english: Memories of longing that I can't return to overtake me.

subtitles.original: 好きな人に さよならを
subtitles.english: Saying goodbye to the one I love.

subtitles.original: いつか見た夕焼けは あんなにキレイだったのに
subtitles.english: The sunset I saw back then was so beautiful,

subtitles.original: 恋なんて呼ぶには 穢れすぎてしまったよ
subtitles.english: But it's become too tainted to be called love.

subtitles.original: そして君が知らずに 幸せな灰になったとて
subtitles.english: Even if you turn into happy ashes without knowing,

subtitles.original: 僕は今更 君が好きだって
subtitles.english: I'm only now realizing that I love you.

subtitles.original: 気付いたよ
subtitles.english: I finally realized it.

subtitles.original: 100年前の同じ日に 君のおばあちゃんは
subtitles.english: One hundred years ago on this same day, your grandmother

subtitles.original: 同じことを言ったんだ
subtitles.english: Said the exact same thing.

subtitles.original: 君の孫のひ孫のその最期に
subtitles.english: At the end of your grandchild's great-grandchild's life,

subtitles.original: 僕はまた一人になる
subtitles.english: I will be alone once again.

subtitles.original: 移ろうメトロポリスと 君の誇りな花束を
subtitles.english: The changing metropolis and your proud bouquet of flowers.
